question: when did teenage mutant ninja turtles come out
vanilla_rag_result: The "Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles" comic book series was first published in May 1984 by Mirage Studios. The animated television series aired on Nickelodeon from September 29, 2012, to November 12, 2017. Additionally, the original animated series began airing in the winter of 1987.
